custom_css: html,body {margin: 0; padding: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; overflow-x: hidden; /* Prevent horizontal scrolling if any content overflows */}
/* Ensure no padding or margin around main container elements */.container,.wrapper,.page-container,.main-content {margin: 0; padding: 0; width: 100%;}
